lombok.extern.flogger

Annotation Type Flogger


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Flogger
    Causes lombok to generate a logger field.

    Complete documentation is found at the project lombok features page for lombok log annotations.

    Example: 

     @Flogger
 public class LogExample {
 }
    will generate: 
     public class LogExample {
     private static final com.google.common.flogger.FluentLogger log = com.google.common.flogger.FluentLogger.forEnclosingClass();
 }
    This annotation is valid for classes and enumerations.
    See Also:
    com.google.common.flogger, @CommonsLog, @Log, @Log4j, @Log4j2, @Slf4j, @XSlf4j, @JBossLog, @CustomLog
